Quality Payment Program

Demographics, Patient Mix, and Performance

Andrew Bruce

2023-11-13

qpp.Rmd
library(provider)
library(furrr)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
nppes(npi = 1144544834) |> 
  glimpse()

plan(multisession, workers = 4)
q <- quality_payment_(npi = 1144544834)
plan(sequential)
